summary: 2000 BMW 528 IDLES ROUGH IN COLD CLIMATES (2002/2003).  THIS PRODUCES NO CHECK ENGINE LIGHTS.  THE PROBLEM GOES AWAY ONCE THE CAR IS WARMED UP OR IN WARMER CLIMATES.  DEALER CONSTANTLY STATES "PROBLEM UNREPRODUCABLE".  AFTER NUMEROUS VISITS I LEFT THE CAR OVERNIGHT AT DEALERSHIP AND THE FOLLOWING MORNING WENT BACK, GRABBED A TECHNICIAN AND HAD HIM SIT IN THE CAR WITH ME.  AFTERWARDS TECHNICIAN SAID IT'S PROBABLY A PART CALLED THE VANOS UNIT.  HAD PART REPLACED THEN PROBLEM WENT AWAY.  THIS WINTER (2003/2004), PROBLEM RESURFACED.*AK
